resources.string: ShareWareLibraryApp: Sample Application to demonstrate ability to share artifacts, gifts, loaners or assets w/ a peering application.

This screen demonstrates the list of features, functions and assets that are deemed share worthy which can either be purchased along w/ the app or in-app purchase. Or by connecting w/ a benefactor peer for evaluation purposes only. In a purchased version - these buttons will be enabled and each will perform the needful but in a free version these are disabled. To enable them temporarily using Share w/ a benefactor in peer - Call to action to Share.
